name: Randle Mason
description: I am loving, caring and loyal. I enjoy keeping fit like dancing and walking in the park. I like to try new activities and like to have a nice peaceful and loving home. I searching for a woman, who is ready for a serious relationship, who wants to love and be loved. I’m very understanding, open minded with a heart of forgiving, loving and caring with sense of humor, hard working with cheerful character, honest, sincere, kind, and intelligent with good looks
